feed.title: Human-Agent Interaction Laboratory
feed.subtitle: Our research focuses on designing and deploying interactive AI agents that can improve people's lives by providing personalized support based on each user's needs, traits, and behaviors.

entry.title: Example post 3
entry.content:
Study: Social robots can benefit hospitalized children
